root.name: Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama!
root.description: OverviewKen to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final is the fourth entry in Zerodiv and Acquire's series of first person dungeon crawlers. It was released on the PSP on October 13, 2011 in Japan. It was also released on the Nintendo 3DS as Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. 3D.
